subtitle:
1 00:00:00,000 --> 00:00:02,966 Bí-kok ê Sî-tāi Cha̍p-chì cha̍p-it kong-pò͘
美國个時代雜誌11公布
US Time Magazine announced on the 11th 2 00:00:02,966 --> 00:00:05,400 jī-khòng-jī-ngó͘ nî nî-tō͘ hong-hûn jîn-bu̍t
2025年年度風雲人物
the 2025 Person of the Year, 3 00:00:05,400 --> 00:00:07,766 ū Hui-ta̍t chip-hêng-tiúⁿ N̂g Jîn-hun
有輝達執行長黃仁勳
including NVIDIA CEO Jensen Huang, 4 00:00:07,766 --> 00:00:09,833 ia̍h-koh Chhiau-bî chip-hêng-tiúⁿ So͘ Chu-hong téng-lâng
抑閣超微執行長蘇姿丰等人
and AMD CEO Lisa Su, among others. 5 00:00:09,833 --> 00:00:13,600 chià tāi-piáu kóng AI tng-teh kái-piàn kui-ê sè-kài
這代表講AI當咧改變規个世界
This signifies that AI is currently changing the whole world. 6 00:00:13,600 --> 00:00:16,633 Sî-tāi Cha̍p-chì cha̍p-it kong-pò͘ nn̄g-tiuⁿ hong-bīn ê siòng-phìⁿ
時代雜誌11公布兩張封面的相片
Time Magazine released two cover photos on the 11th, 7 00:00:16,633 --> 00:00:20,333 tiōng-tiám khǹg tī jī-khòng-jī-ngó͘ nî nî-tō͘ siōng chhut-miâ ê jîn-bu̍t
重點囥佇2025年年度上出名的人物
focusing on the most famous figures of 2025: 8 00:00:20,333 --> 00:00:22,800 tō-sī chia-ê Jîn-kang Tì-hūi siat-kè-su
就是遮的人工智慧設計師
the architects of Artificial Intelligence. 9 00:00:22,800 --> 00:00:26,200 lāi-bīn chi̍t-tiuⁿ hong-bīn sī iōng 1932 nî ê keng-tián siòng-phìⁿ lâi tì-ì
內面一張封面是用1932年的經典相片來致敬
One cover pays homage to a classic 1932 photograph, 10 00:00:26,200 --> 00:00:29,200 tō-sī "Chhiau-koan Tōa-lâu téng ê Tiong-tàu-tǹg"
就是超高大樓頂的中晝頓
"Lunch Atop a Skyscraper." 11 00:00:29,200 --> 00:00:31,433 kā kǹg-thiāu (niû) téng-koân ê kang-lâng
共鋼柱(樑)頂懸的工人
Replacing the workers on the steel beam 12 00:00:31,433 --> 00:00:34,333 oāⁿ-chò peh-ê AI léng-he̍k tāng-liōng-kip ê chip-hêng-tiúⁿ
換做8个AI領域重量級的執行長
with eight heavyweight CEOs from the AI field, 13 00:00:34,333 --> 00:00:36,466 pau-koat Meta ê Chó͘-khek-pek-kek
包括Meta的祖克伯格
including Meta's Zuckerberg, 14 00:00:36,466 --> 00:00:38,066 Chhiau-bî ê So͘ Chu-hong
超微的蘇姿丰
AMD's Lisa Su, 15 00:00:38,066 --> 00:00:39,400 Tek-su-la ê Má-su-khek
特斯拉的馬斯克
Tesla's Musk, 16 00:00:39,400 --> 00:00:41,200 Hui-ta̍t ê N̂g Jîn-hun
輝達的黃仁勳
NVIDIA's Jensen Huang, 17 00:00:41,200 --> 00:00:42,800 OpenAI ê Ó-te̍k-bān téng-téng
OpenAI的奧特曼等等
OpenAI's Altman, and others. 18 00:00:42,800 --> 00:00:44,533 tī lēng-gōa chi̍t-tiuⁿ hong-bīn
佇另外一張封面
On the other cover, 19 00:00:44,533 --> 00:00:46,933 sī hián-sī ūi-tio̍h eng-kè
是顯示圍著鷹架
it displays scaffolding surrounding 20 00:00:46,933 --> 00:00:50,400 chit-má tng-teh khí-chō ū AI jī-iūⁿ ê tōa-lâu
chit-má當咧起造有AI字樣的大樓
a skyscraper shaped like "AI" currently under construction. 21 00:00:50,400 --> 00:00:52,433 Gún chū-chiau tī hiah-ê siūⁿ-siōng
我們聚焦於那些想像
"We really looked at these folks who have imagined, 22 00:00:52,433 --> 00:00:53,866 siat-kè pēng kiàn-kò chit-hāng ki-su̍t
設計並建構這項技術
designed and built this technology, 23 00:00:53,866 --> 00:00:55,733 Koh ín-chhōa gún hiòng-chêng ê lâng
Koh引chhōa 阮向前的人
and are driving us forward." 24 00:00:55,733 --> 00:00:57,800 Chóng-pian-chip Ka-khó-pò͘ kóng
總編輯賈可布講
Editor-in-Chief Jacobs said 25 00:00:57,800 --> 00:01:00,266 jī-khòng-jī-ngó͘ nî sī Jîn-kang Tì-hūi
2025年是人工智慧
2025 is the year Artificial Intelligence 26 00:01:00,266 --> 00:01:02,166 choân-lêng choân-bīn po̍k-hoat ê chi̍t-nî
全能全面爆發的一年
capabilities will fully explode, 27 00:01:02,166 --> 00:01:04,366 hō͘ Jîn-lūi sī ná o-ló koh ná hoân-ló
Hō͘人類是ná o-ló koh ná煩惱
leaving humanity both amazed and worried. 28 00:01:04,366 --> 00:01:06,400 chia-ê tā-chō AI ê sak-chhiú
chia-ê打造AI的sak手
These architects shaping AI 29 00:01:06,400 --> 00:01:08,233 m̄-nā sī tōa-khì-gia̍p ê léng-siù
不但是大企業的領袖
are not only leaders of major corporations 30 00:01:08,233 --> 00:01:09,866 mā pau-koat chiâⁿ-chē gián-kiù jîn-oân
mā包括chiâⁿ chē研究人員
but also include many researchers. 31 00:01:09,866 --> 00:01:12,233 tùi choân-kiû chèng-tī, keng-chè
對全球政治, 經濟
Their influence on global politics, economics, 32 00:01:12,233 --> 00:01:14,733 hâm seng-oa̍h chân-bīn ê éng-hióng chin-chiàⁿ sī chiâⁿ tōa
和生活層面的影響真正是chiâⁿ大
and daily life is truly immense. 33 00:01:14,733 --> 00:01:16,633 Chit-kî te̍k-kham ê hong-bīn kò͘-sū
這期特刊的封面故事
This special issue's cover story 34 00:01:16,633 --> 00:01:19,266 tiám-miâ Hui-ta̍t tī teh sian-chìn cheng-phìⁿ chhī-tiûⁿ
點名輝達佇先進的晶片市場
names NVIDIA in the advanced chip market 35 00:01:19,266 --> 00:01:21,433 pí pa̍t-lâng lóng khah lī-hāi
比別人lóng khah厲害
as being more powerful than anyone else, 36 00:01:21,433 --> 00:01:23,166 chhî-siok hō͘ tāi-ke lâi "siau AI"
持續予大家來痟AI
continuously driving the AI craze for everyone. 37 00:01:23,166 --> 00:01:25,933 Chit-hêng-tiúⁿ N̂g Jîn-hun í-keng m̄-nā kan-na sī chi̍t-ê khì-gia̍p léng-siù
執行長黃仁勳已經不那干焦是一个企業領袖
CEO Jensen Huang is no longer just a business leader; 38 00:01:25,933 --> 00:01:28,400 koh pìⁿ-chò éng-hióng kok-ka kho-ki chiàn-lio̍k
koh變做影響國家科技戰略
he has become a key figure influencing national tech strategy 39 00:01:28,400 --> 00:01:30,566 hâm tē-iân éng-hióng-la̍t ê tiōng-iàu jîn-bu̍t
和地緣影響力的重要人物
and possessing geopolitical influence. 40 00:01:30,566 --> 00:01:32,600 N̂g Jîn-hun tī choan-hóng lāi-bīn mā kóng
黃仁勳佇專訪內面mā講
In the exclusive interview, Jensen Huang stated 41 00:01:32,600 --> 00:01:34,866 Jîn-kang Tì-hūi í-keng pìⁿ-chò hiān-tāi siā-hōe lāi-bīn
人工智慧已經變做現代社會內面
that Artificial Intelligence has become 42 00:01:34,866 --> 00:01:36,433 siōng tiōng-iàu ê ki-su̍t
上重要的技術
the most important technology in modern society. 43 00:01:36,433 --> 00:01:38,433 só͘-ū ê sán-gia̍p, khì-gia̍p hâm kok-ka
所有的產業, 企業和國家
All industries, businesses, and nations 44 00:01:38,433 --> 00:01:40,566 lóng pit-su ài liáu-kái i, sú-iōng i, kiàn-siat i
lóng必須愛了解伊, 使用伊, 建設伊
must understand it, use it, and build it. 45 00:01:40,566 --> 00:01:42,700 Cha̍p-nî āu góa hi-bāng lâng khòaⁿ-tio̍h chit-ê hong-bīn
十年後我希望人看著chit-ê封面
"A decade from now, I hope people look at this cover 46 00:01:42,700 --> 00:01:44,366 hâm hong-bīn kò͘-sū ê pò-tō
和封面故事的報導
and the accompanying journalism, 47 00:01:44,366 --> 00:01:46,500 Ē khòaⁿ-tio̍h gún chhì-tô͘
會看著我們試圖
and see that we were trying 48 00:01:46,500 --> 00:01:48,766 bīn-tùi Jîn-kang Tì-hūi chit-ê kiông-tōa ê le̍k-liōng
面對人工智慧chit-ê強大力量
to grapple with the awesome power of AI, 49 00:01:48,766 --> 00:01:50,466 kiám-sī i ta̍k hāng pō͘-hūn
檢視伊逐項部分
looking at all parts of it, 50 00:01:50,466 --> 00:01:52,666 koan-chù thui-tōng i hiòng-chêng ê iàu-kak
關注推動伊向前的要角
focusing on the key players driving it forward. 51 00:01:52,666 --> 00:01:55,233 chiū-sǹg góa kám-kak cha̍p-nî āu i khó-lêng í-keng kòe-sî
就算我感覺十年後伊可能已經過時
Even though I feel it might be outdated in ten years, 52 00:01:55,233 --> 00:01:57,400 tān i i-jiân ē chiâⁿ-chò le̍k-sú ê tiōng-iàu piau-chì
但伊依然會成為歷史的重要標誌
it will still be a great marker of history; 53 00:01:57,400 --> 00:01:59,600 che mā sī nî-tō͘ hong-hûn jîn-bu̍t ê bo̍k-piau
這嘛是年度風雲人物的目標
this is also Person of the Year, the aim to be." 54 00:01:59,600 --> 00:02:02,133 Hong-bīn ê kò͘-sū mā kóng-tio̍h AI hoat-tián ê o͘-àm-bīn
封面的故事嘛講著AI發展的烏暗面
The cover story also touches on the dark side of AI development, 55 00:02:02,133 --> 00:02:04,366 chhin-chhiūⁿ Bí-kok 16 hòe ê chheng-siàu-liân
親像美國16歲的青少年
such as the case of a 16-year-old American teenager 56 00:02:04,366 --> 00:02:06,733 hâm ChatGPT tùi-ōe liáu-āu khì chū-sat ê sū-kiāⁿ
含ChatGPT對話了後去自殺的事件
who committed suicide after conversing with ChatGPT. 57 00:02:06,733 --> 00:02:09,300 ka-tiúⁿ chí-khòng kóng che tùi-ōe ê lōe-iông
家長指控講che對話的內容
The parents alleged that the content of the conversation 58 00:02:09,300 --> 00:02:11,100 chō-sêng gín-á sim-lí siū-shòng
造成囡仔心理受創
caused psychological trauma to the child, 59 00:02:11,100 --> 00:02:12,233 Ín-khí ka thê-kò
引起ka提告
they filed a lawsuit. 60 00:02:12,233 --> 00:02:14,733 ín-hoat siā-hōe koan-chù AI ê an-choân
引發社會關注AI的安全
This sparked societal concern regarding AI safety 61 00:02:14,733 --> 00:02:16,100 hâm chek-jīm ê būn-tê
和責任的問題
and issues of responsibility. 62 00:02:16,100 --> 00:02:18,500 Che sī Sî-tāi Cha̍p-chì tùi 1982 nî
這是時代雜誌對1982年
This is Time Magazine, since 1982 63 00:02:18,500 --> 00:02:19,933 soán-chhut Kò-jîn Tiān-náu
選出個人電腦
when it selected the Personal Computer, 64 00:02:19,933 --> 00:02:22,866 hām 1988 nî soán-chhut Bīn-tùi Tiong-tāi Gûi-hiám ê Tē-kiû í-lâi
和1988年選出面對重大危險的地球以來
and 1988 when it selected the Endangered Earth, 65 00:02:25,333 --> 00:02:27,533 pan-hō͘ m̄-sī tan it chi̍t-ê lâng ê tùi-siōng
頒予毋是單一chi̍t-ê人的對象
to a subject that is not a single individual. 66 00:02:27,533 --> 00:02:29,200 Kong-sī Sin-bûn Si Hūi-tiong pian-e̍k
公視新聞施慧中編譯
PTS News, translated by Si Hūi-tiong.
